transcript: I have to understand that the people who want to give me advice no matter what their intention a great degree of their advice is basically what they would tell themselves and there's nothing wrong with that but I am not them there's just very few people that I feel like have better context on my life than I do and so I have to see how many things do we overlap on between their old self that they're projecting their advice on to and me so I try and pull out the things that don't overlap and just focus on the few things that we do have in common
